short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically extract related keywords using Google Suggest, YouTube Suggest, Bing, and Amazon Suggest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keyword Suggest Tool is a powerful tool that helps users automatically search and generate related keywords through popular platforms such as Google Suggest, YouTube Suggest, Bing, and Amazon Suggest. 
With the ability to create additional keyword variations, this tool helps you leverage the keyword suggestion feature of Google Suggest to find a plethora of related keywords. Specifically, it works as follows:
1. Install the chrome extension
2. Go to any of the supported websites - Google™ YouTube™, Amazon™, eBay™ or Etsy™ and perform a search
3. Click on the icon of the tool in the search box and view the results
